import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); // Simulate form submission setTimeout(() => { setIsSubmitting(false); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); alert('Thank you for your message! I\'ll get back to you soon.'); }, 1000); }; return (

); }; export default Contact;
